Title: Brides
Actors: Damian Lewis, Victoria Haralabidou, AndrÃ©a FerrÃ©ol, Evi Saoulidou
Plot: Set in 1922, is the story of a mail order bride, one of 700, aboard the SS KING ALEXANDER, who falls in love with an American photographer. She is bound for her new husband, in New York; he is on his way home to a failed marriage.
